website_summaries.verdict: This jump trainer is available in different sizes and resistance strengths to meet all your needs.
pros: With resistance bands ranging from 50 to 120 lb
and 2 waist band sizes available, this jump trainer fits most people comfortably
2 resistance bands and a carrying bag are included
Customers love the padding in the waist band and ankle straps
cons: A few customers received incorrect sizes

customer_reviews.title: Noth worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept but the wasteband constantly needs to be adjusted and the we could not get the ankle straps to stay in place so after 10 jumps you had to stop and secure it again so you never got a good rhythm going. It's sitting there because i forgot to send it back and the ankles straps are now useless after using it 3 times for my son.
customer_reviews.author: nycbrooklyn

customer_reviews.title: There others are good, but this is equivalent to the Cadillac among ...
customer_reviews.text: I've got a couple of different brands of this type of band and the Innstar is by far the nicer product. There others are good, but this is equivalent to the Cadillac among cars! Great padding, well stitched, more adjustable. The girls fight over who gets these as opposed to the others. I'll be ordering many more!
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: Size Matters
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to buy this product due to the resistance on it and thought it would help me during practice. I ordered the item and got it with 2 days, I opened it this morning, excited to use it and BAM, it does not fit around my waist. This product is definitely not for someone with a larger waist and I'm not talking about fat I'm a larger person with a 42" waist and it does not fit what so ever. It would have been helpful if the belt size was in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Vanity Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Dunker
customer_reviews.text: Hey, if you are reading this you are probably trying to dunk in the next few months. If you want something to help you be able to dunk a basketball this will help. This will help strengthen your legs and give you explosiveness. You will feel sore almost every time you use this for an hour or 2 a day. Be consistent as consistency is key.
customer_reviews.author: Rancell Brito

customer_reviews.title: It has helped in only 4 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old son has been using this training tool now for about 4 weeks. We have already noticed an improvement in his vertical jump. It is very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good item so far BUT there are no assembly directions or workout guide.
customer_reviews.text: I received the product on time but it did not include any directions nor did it have a workout manual/ exercise guide. After looking at the pictures on the product page in the Amazon app, I was able to put it together and it works well so far. I think that I have two of the same side leg/ ankle support though. Hopefully, the company will include directions on assembling this product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Coston Burnes

customer_reviews.title: Not for short people
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is 13 only 5' and is a volleyball setter. There is no way to adjust the length and I didn't like the way it hooks up. I guess it would be ok for a tall guy thats trying to jump higher but not for someone that is short.
customer_reviews.author: IT Support

customer_reviews.title: Home workouts
customer_reviews.text: I do not have time to go to gym and i love to be in shape specially my thighs.i decided to buy this band rather than spending my money at gym. It has good quality and good for several exercises. My sister also use this band .she use it for booty exercises and she really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: BILLY

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son. It was a challenge and helpful for about 2 weeks then it just didn’t seem to go much.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product for martial arts training.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I’m a 55 year old martial artist artist with back issues and recovering from a serious hip injury. I purchased this so I could rehab my hip with squats without putting any pressure on my back. It worked great for this. I am also able to work kicks against resistance to rebuild muscle after my injury. Since my initial purchase I have added the upgraded exercise handles so I can do additional exercises with them. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B.

customer_reviews.title: Strong durable training device
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a good a training band device. It is durable. I use it twice a week. Mainly after playing rec basketball. This device is good in combination with plyometric exercises.
customer_reviews.author: knightkazz

customer_reviews.title: This jump trainer is of good quality. I enjoy using it to practice bouncing
customer_reviews.text: This jump trainer is of good quality. I enjoy using it to practice bouncing. Every time after practicing, i can feel my legs are burning which is amazing. To achieve my basketball dream! Let's burn it out! Btw, the product works just fine for my 38-inch waist, I'm afraid it doesn't fit any bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is great until you get down to the ankle straps the clip on the side that secures it is cheap and does not hold the strap. We’ve even tried taping it and it still comes undone it’s very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy
customer_reviews.text: It’sa good idea but it’s not very functional. In order for the belt to even remotely stay on you have to put the belt on super tight, which constricts breathing
customer_reviews.author: Brynn

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: Received them a few days ago. I expected to find instructions on putting them together, sizing them correctly, etc. There was absolutely nothing in the box except for the trainers. Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for customer service, beyond excellent, only complaint I have about the product is the straps that go under your feet tend to loosen up, I just knotted those and all was golden.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent product but doesn't fit as mentioned
customer_reviews.text: My waist size is 31. Product requires a lot of adjustment to fit my waist. It is almost useless for people of my dimensions - 5'7" tall, 31"-32" waist, small ankle width. I found a work around: I wear it around my feet which makes the spring more effective, but it certainly does not feel like 90 lbs!
customer_reviews.author: Naveen Mathew Nathan S.

customer_reviews.title: Improves your vertical jumping
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. My son uses it regularly to work on his vertical jump. He feels it’s improving his basketball game
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: No need for me to purchase an expensive platform vertical jumper and a glute machine!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jocalyn Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the program and have fun with your new jumping abilities
customer_reviews.text: Top quality material - very durable- listen to me when I tell you “explosive jumping is 100% guaranteed “ I mean it - just follow the workout plan and usual see . Also awesome customer support-very fast shipping - makes you feel like you got it directly from your coach .
customer_reviews.author: cadberry

customer_reviews.title: Basketball
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a product to help him with his vertical jump. I have seen an improvement but you will have to put in the work.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Branson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The item is very good and in perfect quality! It is really helpful and the deal is super worthy.
customer_reviews.author: yuxi zhang

customer_reviews.title: Effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Wearing for a few mins can feel the effects.
customer_reviews.author: Ezequiel Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: THAT IT TAKES A LITTLE TIME GETTING USE TO BUT, IT'S GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT, IT'S USED FOR BASKETBALL, TO STRENGTHEN MY BABY'S LEGS, HE ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Worrell

customer_reviews.title: A must have product for any trainer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. So far lol naw I love it all seven
customer_reviews.author: Ballplayerz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit all sizes
customer_reviews.text: it didn't fit and i was not able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: @that1fantasyguy

customer_reviews.title: Expect discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Feels like it going to break at times but it works well
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. There was a size problem, but their customer service fix it quickly. I defiantly recommend there products.
customer_reviews.author: FD

customer_reviews.title: That’s amazing. I am 6-5” and this one really fits ...
customer_reviews.text: That’s amazing. I am 6-5” and this one really fits me perfectly.i want to do this kind of exercises but I don’t like driving to the gyms after a whole day hard working but this one solve the problems for me without spending too much time, like 30mins should be enough . Recommend this one .
customer_reviews.author: nan

customer_reviews.title: Missing workout guide
customer_reviews.text: I received mine today but their was no workout guide. What must I do to get one?
customer_reviews.author: Ken Asuao

customer_reviews.title: Horribly Designed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even get to use the product!!! The left foot strap broke within the setup!! I was excited to use the product, but since they use plastic to connect the straps, it just broke!!!
customer_reviews.author: viatyx

customer_reviews.title: Age Requirement?
customer_reviews.text: Very interested in getting for my son, how old should someone be to use this?
customer_reviews.author: Constance Benedetti

product_meta.title: INNSTAR Vertical Jump Trainer Leg Strength Resistance Bands Set for Basketball Triple Jump Football Volleyball Training Provide of Customized Services
feature_bullets: We are professional manufacturer, we pay more attention to the workmanship and also the raw material.All of our products are thoroughly tested before we ship them out to you.And each resistance band made of 100% Malaysia natural latex
Increase vertical jump, improve leg strength,leg explosive power ,agility,running speed, flexibility, balance,and endurance

The adjustable range of the waistband is from 27.5 inches to 38.5 inches.THE WAISTBELT OF XL SET IS 44 INCHES.If you are a larger person,We provide customized services，Please contact us and let us know the size of your waist and ankle .
This product can be used for basketball, volleyball and football sports training and squat training

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - INNSTAR jump trainer come with a 100% satisfaction guarantee, and if they don't work out for you for any reason then contact us for your full money back. We know you will love them! To enjoy your premium jump trainer , click 'Add to Cart' now!

specifications.Manufacturer: Anhui Jikedongshen Fitness Equipment Technology Co.,Ltd
